name: VR Railcar Unloading Training Demo for Oculus Rift S
name_original: VR Railcar Unloading Training Demo for Oculus Rift S
description:
Put on the Oculus Rift S headset and enter the VR world of a training scenario!
Pick out your PPE by picking it up or selecting it with the "B" button. You can do both as well. Pick up items using the Index Trigger on the hand controllers.
Follow the steps to secure the railcar, steam the product. hook up the pump and unload.
Select the steps with the "B" button and enjoy the view!
